metadata.title: CVE-2023-1233 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in Resource Timing in Google Chrome priorto 111.0.5563.64 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to obtain potentially sensitive information from APIvia a crafted Chrome Extension. (Chromium security severity: Low)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
